metadata.description: The pen, ink, and wash images of this graphic novel speak louder than words in relating a soldier's experiences during World War I, from his initial enthusiasm to his ultimate disillusionment. A dramatic narrative by Hungarian veteran Szegedi Szüts portrays the tragedy of wartime life on the battlefield as well as on the home front. Includes new Foreword by Peter Kuper. Contains adult material.
metadata.name: My War
